    • Constructor Detail

      • NewHadoopRunWriter

        public NewHadoopRunWriter(org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.Mapper.Context context,
                  String mapId,
                  int splitId,
                  int flushNo)
        Create a new HadoopRunWriter, specifying the output collector of the map task the run number and the flush number.
        Parameters:
        context - where to emit the posting lists to
        mapId - the task id of the map currently being processed
        splitId - the id of the split
        flushNo - the number of times that this map task has flushed
